Articles.Content:
The title explains it all. I want a mod, with rings for jool, and nothing else. I know a mod that adds rings to jool, and They look beautiful. In all my artworks that i do in my free time, i draw Jool with rings. With my Jool-5 survey probe approaching its encounter, i want to arrive to a ringed Jool. So, please, can someone make a mod withh just some Jool rings?

Something like this:

Better Atmospheres has rings for Jool, but I'm sure Proot's pack has more beautiful ones. If you don't want anything but the rings, then simply delete all the folders not associated with Kittopiatech from Proots pack.
Ok, I'll try that...hope it doesn't crash the game... Or from my idiocy, delete the sytem32 folder...
